mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHART (USER_ID, DATE, WEEK, NORMAL, ABNORMAL) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), DAYNAME(NOW()), #{normal}, #{abnormal}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE WEEK = VALUES(WEEK), NORMAL = VALUES(NORMAL), ABNORMAL = VALUES(ABNORMAL);
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(DATE) AS dateOnly, SUM(NORMAL) AS totalNormal, SUM(ABNORMAL) AS totalAbnormal FROM CHART WHERE DATE(DATE) = CURDATE() AND USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY dateOnly

SELECT DAYNAME(DATE) AS weekday, SUM(NORMAL) AS totalNormal, SUM(ABNORMAL) AS totalAbnormal FROM CHART WHERE DATE >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY DAYOFWEEK(DATE) ORDER BY DATE;
